rukus.text: UThixo wenu nguThixo Omnye, kodwa abo bangakholwayo kuBomi oBuzayo, iintliziyo zabo ziya kuphika oku yaye banenkukhumalo
Eneneni uAllâh Uyakwazi abakufihlayo nabakuvezayo. Inene Yena Akabathandi abakhukhumalayo
Xa kusithiwa kubo: “Yintoni na oko kutyhilwe yiNkosi yenu (i’Kur’ân) bathi bona: “Ziintsomi zabantu bakudala!”
Bona baza kuthwala imithwalo (yezono) zabo ngokugcweleyo ngoMhla woVuko, baze bathwaliswe nemithwalo yabo babalahlekisayo bengazi. Kungcole kanobom oko baza kukuthwaliswa
